post-install-cmd: php -r "if (!is_dir('conf')) { mkdir('conf', 0755, true); echo 'Created conf directory.'; } if (!file_exists('conf/cache.php')) { touch('conf/cache.php'); echo 'Created cache.php file.'; }"

php -r "if (!is_dir('conf')) { mkdir('conf', 0755, true); echo 'Created conf directory.'; } if (!file_exists('conf/routes_cache.php')) { touch('conf/routes_cache.php'); echo 'Created cache.php file.'; }"
